text:
Just got 3 arowanas from Mr Gan! Some of the best raw quality reds that we have seen after shopping around many aquariums in SG...

Take your time to pick a nice one from the many he has and you will not be disappointed!
Extremely rude owner that is not interested to serve customer. Chase us away and told us to visit other fish farm when all we did was just viewing the fishes. Bad experience
Mr. Gan is a patient and nice old man that takes time to explain his arowana business. Extremely good experience.
Owner is rude and disrespectful. There are much more better farms out there. Go at your own risk.
Stop by to view pellet trained red and gold arowana!!!
